Half-Life: Opposing Force is an expansion for the original Half-Life. This time you are Corporal Shepard, a soldier tasked with hunting down Gordon Freeman while fending of aliens at the same time. It soon turns out that in general chaos everyone fights everyone, including new alien species and black ops soldiers. 
There are a few new weapons (alien lightning gun, Desert Eagle) and some new features. You get to lead other soldiers with various specialties: engineer who can cut doors, medic who can heal you. You learn to climb ropes and at one point you can use alien technology of grappling gun. 

Music sets the mood nicely, especially dynamic themes when something serious is going down. 
It's 2019 and I definitely enjoyed playing Half-Life: Opposing Force!
It's like a default Half-Life, but with Deagle and balls.

If you played the original Half-Life, you would really enjoy Opposing Force. An expansion for the already revolutionary Half-Life following a new protagonist, Adrian Shepherd. Opposing Force introduces new gameplay elements such as new weapons, a grappling hook, squad interactions which was later inplemented to Half-Life 2, etc. Story was a focus on the marines' perspective during the events of Half-Life. Also got more hints and story to the mysterious G-man in the last game. Definitely a must play if you enjoyed the original Half Life.

Some annoying issues with the game is the glitches, dated AI, and crashes, but we can all ignore that. 

Thanks to Half-Life Opposing force, it helped kickstarted Gearbox Software that later gave us Borderlands Series but sadly, Borderlands and a few other titles were really excellent games and other titles such as Duke Nukem Forever, Aliens: Colonel Marines, Battleborn were quite crappy.  Finally Valve is taking development to Half-Life: Alyx which hopefully would bring Half-Life series back from the dead, and hopefully we could see a future story with Adrian Shepherd.


Edit 18/05/2020
Valve released Half-Life:Alyx, if Half-Life 3 were to ever be released, Valve stated themselves they want it to revolutionize the video game industry so we all have to be patient.

První datadisk do původní hry Half life. Nyní se ocitnete v kůži amerického vojáka, který byl poslán, aby vyřešil problém v tajném středisku Black Mesa. Příběh se odehrává v úplně stejném časoprostoru jako původní hra, jen se odehrává z jiného úhlu pohledu. Hra je téměř totožná s původní hrou až na několik inovací co se obsahu týče.

+ Příběh
+ Nové zbraně
+ Nové hádanky
+ Noví nepřátelé
+ Několik nových bossfightů
+ Multiplayer, který funguje dodnes
+ Možnost ukládání kdykoliv
+ Nenáročné na HW
+ Bunnyhop
+ Cena

- Herní doba (4 hodiny)
- Bugy a glitche
- Okolní zvuky většinou "přeřvávají" dialogy
- Mohly by být titulky

Hratelnost 9/10
Možnosti hry 7/10
Zabavení 9/10
Celkové zhodnocení 8/10

Doporučuji všem, které bavila původní hra!

Half-Life: Opposing Force is a stand-alone expansion for the classic hit Half-Life. You play as a US Marine, Adrian Shephard, who was assigned the task of cleaning up a Resonance Cascade at the Black Mesa facility (a Resonance Cascade is basically a massive alien invasion caused by unstable teleportation experiments). Adrian and his squad catch a helicopter ride to the testing facility, but are attacked by alien ships. After crash landing inside Black Mesa, the marine wakes up to a scientist giving him CPR. However, Adrian knows his mission is to eliminate anyone who knows about the alien invasion. The choice is up to you if you spare the lives of naive scientists or murder everything in sight.

(P.S.) This expansion often goes on sale, usually costing around a dollar or less. I recommend that you wait for a sale before purchasing, as it is quite short.

Keep it up.

El juego en si esta demasiado bien, incluso en cierto aspecto mejor que la primera entrega de Half life, aunque este sea menos extenso que la primera entrega, siento que refresca toda la jugabilidad de este, en cuanto al uso de armas, plataformas, objetos, y más, el estilo lineal del Mapeo me parece bueno, aunque recicla algo de lo que tenia el titulo Naranjo anterior, lo malo, es cuando uno va entrar a otra zona despues de la pantalla de carga, lamentablemente el personaje se queda quieto, y no puedo moverme a menos que reinicie el nivel en "Save Game" y es una lástima ya que quiero jugar sin ese tipo de interrupciones, no sé si es un error por ser una nueva versión o compatibilidad con el juego, pero fuera de eso esta realmente bien, a mi me gusta mucho Half life tanto como el original como sus expansiones, pero debo reconocer que a pesar de que opposing force no es un juego creado directamente de Valve, me gusta mas que el titulo original, aunque digo que igual estan como casi al mismo nivel, pero sin duda, se ha ganado mi cariño este juego <3

Opposing force in my opinion is better than half life 1. It takes what Half life does makes and makes it better with newer weapons, much better enemy npc and dynamic locations. Its like looking at the black mesa incident from a different perspective. The narrative is compelling enough and the game is short enough to pull through in one sitting. The short duration of the game is understandable since it is an expansion pass.
